{{Infobox Key Item |name = Coin Case |image = [[File:CoinCase_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Coin Case''. |use = A case for holding Money |obtain = After first Pokémon caught }} ===Description=== A case for holding money ===Acquisition=== Choose your starter Pokémon and defeat it. Professor Oak will add it to your [[Key Items]] list ===Effects=== Allows the storage of Money
